client.controller

Class ClientConnectionSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.controller.ClientConnectionSocket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientConnection, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, RMIServerInterface

    public class ClientConnectionSocket
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientConnection, java.io.Serializable
    In this class I pass the data to Socket_Server
